prompt:
Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Our product offers exceptional value and can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its worth to us, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. This represents a substantial savings compared to our standard pricing and is reflective of our commitment to making high-quality products accessible to valued customers like yourself. We are confident that this investment will pay off in terms of efficiency, productivity, and satisfaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
